com.beepell.expression
Class VariableResolver

java.lang.Object
  com.beepell.expression.Resolver
      com.beepell.expression.VariableResolver
All Implemented Interfaces:
XPathVariableResolver
public class VariableResolver
extends Resolver
implements XPathVariableResolver

An implementation of XPathVariableResolver based on ExpressionContext.

The job of the VariableResolver is to be an adapter between the ExpressionContext and the XPathVariableResolver.

Author:
Tim Hallwyl
